25 Things I Didn't Want to Know About You

I don’t share the authors opinion that this Facebook meme is waste of time. I have gotten to know quite a few interesting things about friends of mine and I keep meaning to reply myself.

However, what I did find really interesting, were numbers reported:

An estimated 5 million of these notes "” that’s 125 million facts "” have appeared on the website within the past week.

Facebook: 25 Things I Didn’t Want to Know About You – TIME
